OperationSpec.Description: Creates information object, sets it values and stores it

Parameter.name: HttpFormData
Parameter.designDesc: Http POST data. Unprocessed and unfiltered.

MethodExecute.name: CatchInvalidDomains
MethodExecute.designDesc: Catch and throw an exception for invalid domains (system reserved)

MethodExecute.name: CreateInternalObjects
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create internal objects, whose values will be set after creation.

TargetDefinition.name: FieldValues
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Filtered field value collection. Filter by non-prefix, add ID to keys. Reflect also to internal objects notation with ___ names texts.

TargetDefinition.name: ObjectLinkValues
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Filtered object link value collection. Filter by Object_ prefix, add ID to keys.

TargetDefinition.name: BinaryContentFiles
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Filtered binary content value collection. Filter by File_ prefix, add ID to keys.

MethodExecute.name: SetFieldValues
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set field values of created object.

MethodExecute.name: SetObjectLinks
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set object links of created object.

MethodExecute.name: StoreInitialObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Stores the created object first time - with set values.

MethodExecute.name: SetBinaryContent
MethodExecute.designDesc: Sets binary content of created object.

MethodExecute.name: StoreCompleteObject
MethodExecute.designDesc: Stores the created object - with all set values.

OperationSpec.Description: Deletes specified information object.

MethodExecute.name: CatchInvalidDomains
MethodExecute.designDesc: Catch and throw an exception for invalid domains (system reserved)

OperationSpec.Description: Creates device membership for security context for owner.
Set device membership validation.

MethodExecute.name: SetDeviceValidAndActiveValue
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set device valid and active value

OperationSpec.Description: Delete device membership record entirely.
Creates and sends email validation for device join confirmation.

Parameter.name: OwningAccount
Parameter.designDesc: Security context owner - if an account

Parameter.name: OwningGroup
Parameter.designDesc: Security context owner - if a group

TargetDefinition.name: OwnerEmailAddresses
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Owner relevant email address(es). For group - the initiator's active group email, for account - all of accounts emails

MethodExecute.name: SendEmailConfirmation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create and send email confirmation for joining the devices

OperationSpec.Description: Creates device membership FROM the group as authenticated against other group.

Parameter.name: TargetBallHostName
Parameter.designDesc: Target Ball instance host name. If not given, using the same host that the call was made from.

Parameter.name: TargetGroupID
Parameter.designDesc: Target group ID to which the device membership is established

Parameter.name: SharedSecret
Parameter.designDesc: Shared secret with the back-end to establish connection

OperationSpec.Description: Negotiate and validate authentication as active device.

MethodExecute.name: NegotiateWithTarget
MethodExecute.designDesc: Negotiate with target party. Set validation flag as true if succesfully negotiated.

OperationSpec.Description: Delete device membership record entirely.
Creates information output for security context for owner.

Parameter.name: AuthenticatedDeviceID
Parameter.designDesc: Authenticated device ID for this connection (optional)

OperationSpec.Description: Set information output validation and active-statuses.

TargetDefinition.name: InformationOutput
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Information output of which to set the status

MethodExecute.name: SetInputValidAndActiveValue
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set input valid and active value

OperationSpec.Description: Delete information input source.
Creates and sends email validation for information output confirmation.

Parameter.name: OwningAccount
Parameter.designDesc: Security context owner - if an account

Parameter.name: OwningGroup
Parameter.designDesc: Security context owner - if a group

TargetDefinition.name: OwnerEmailAddresses
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Owner relevant email address(es). For group - the initiator's active group email, for account - all of accounts emails

MethodExecute.name: SendEmailConfirmation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create and send email confirmation for approving information output

OperationSpec.Description: Push information output to given target

TargetDefinition.name: InformationOutput
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Information output to push the data to

MethodExecute.name: VerifyValidOutput
MethodExecute.designDesc: Verify that output is valid and active

TargetDefinition.name: DestinationURL
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Location to push the output to

TargetDefinition.name: LocalContentURL
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Local content URL to push the output from

OperationSpec.Description: Creates information input for security context for owner.

Parameter.name: AuthenticatedDeviceID
Parameter.designDesc: Authenticated device ID for this connection (optional)

OperationSpec.Description: Set information input validation and active-statuses.

TargetDefinition.name: InformationInput
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Information input of which to set the status

MethodExecute.name: SetInputValidAndActiveValue
MethodExecute.designDesc: Set input valid and active value

OperationSpec.Description: Delete information input source.
Creates and sends email validation for information input confirmation.

Parameter.name: OwningAccount
Parameter.designDesc: Security context owner - if an account

Parameter.name: OwningGroup
Parameter.designDesc: Security context owner - if a group

TargetDefinition.name: OwnerEmailAddresses
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Owner relevant email address(es). For group - the initiator's active group email, for account - all of accounts emails

MethodExecute.name: SendEmailConfirmation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create and send email confirmation for joining the devices

OperationSpec.Description: Fetch input information from given source

TargetDefinition.name: InformationInput
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Information input to fetch the data for

MethodExecute.name: VerifyValidInput
MethodExecute.designDesc: Verify that input is valid and active

TargetDefinition.name: InputFetchLocation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Location to fetch the input into

TargetDefinition.name: InputFetchName
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Name of item to store the fetched input - derived from local content name.

OperationSpec.Description: Process fetched inputs

TargetDefinition.name: InformationInput
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Information input to fetch the data for

MethodExecute.name: VerifyValidInput
MethodExecute.designDesc: Verify that input is valid and active

TargetDefinition.name: InputFetchLocation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Location to fetch the input into

ReturnValue.name: ProcessingResultsToStore
ReturnValue.designDesc: Information objects to store as result of processing

ReturnValue.name: ProcessingResultsToDelete
ReturnValue.designDesc: Information objects to delete as result of processing

OperationSpec.Description: Begins account email address registration. Registration needs to be confimed by clicking the email validation link that is sent to email to be registered.

Parameter.name: AccountID
Parameter.designDesc: AccountID whose email is to be registered

Parameter.name: EmailAddress
Parameter.designDesc: Email address to add to account

MethodExecute.name: ValidateUnexistingEmail
MethodExecute.designDesc: Validate that the email to add is not already registered

TargetDefinition.name: EmailValidation
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Email validation object prepared ready to stored and to be sent

MethodExecute.name: SendEmailConfirmation
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create and send email confirmation for validating the email

OperationSpec.Description: Begins account email address registration. Registration needs to be confimed by clicking the email validation link that is sent to email to be registered.

Parameter.name: AccountID
Parameter.designDesc: AccountID whose email is to be registered

Parameter.name: EmailAddress
Parameter.designDesc: Email address to add to account

OperationSpec.Description: Create group with templates

Parameter.name: TemplateNameList
Parameter.designDesc: Comma separated list of templates to initialize group at creation

OperationExecute.name: SetDefaultRedirect
OperationExecute.designDesc: Sets groups default redirect if given

MethodExecute.name: InitializeGroupWithDefaultObjects
MethodExecute.designDesc: Initialize group with default objects (hardcoded for now)

OperationSpec.Description: Sets owner web redirect. Stores a text file in owner folder with redirector-specific name. Might support parameters and multiple files later on.

Parameter.name: Owner
Parameter.designDesc: Owner whose redirection is to be set

Parameter.name: RedirectPath
Parameter.designDesc: Redirect path, if null or empty, the redirection is to be removed.

MethodExecute.name: SetRedirection
MethodExecute.designDesc: Sets the redirection file for owner.

OperationSpec.Description: Process all request usage records to owner collections. Call repeatedly proper batch processing operation(s). Break if operation doesn't process for any reason, such as failing to acquire lock.

Parameter.name: ProcessBatchSize
Parameter.designDesc: Batch size to process as a block.

MethodExecute.name: ExecuteBatchProcessor
MethodExecute.designDesc: Execute batch processor with given batch size until there are less than batch size left

OperationSpec.Description: Process request usage records to owner collections. Process given amount at a time, acquire lock to allow parallel launches. Don't process if the minimum number is not met.

Parameter.name: ProcessBatchSize
Parameter.designDesc: Batch size to process as a block.

Parameter.name: ProcessIfLess
Parameter.designDesc: Process if less than requested size

TargetDefinition.name: BatchToProcess
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Retrieve block blob list to process - and acquire lock if possible. Null if doesn't match requirement or fail to acquire lock

ReturnValue.name: ProcessedFullCount
ReturnValue.designDesc: Did the operation have full batch size to process

OperationSpec.Description: Group usage monitoring to hourly and daily

Parameter.name: Owner
Parameter.designDesc: Owner whose usage monitoring is to be updated

Parameter.name: AmountOfDays
Parameter.designDesc: How many days to include from history

MethodExecute.name: CreateUsageMonitoringSummaries
MethodExecute.designDesc: Create usage monitoring summaries for 5 minute, 1 hour and 1 day intervals

OperationSpec.Description: Update usage monitoring of an owner

Parameter.name: Owner
Parameter.designDesc: Owner whose usage monitoring is to be updated

Parameter.name: MonitoringItemTimeSpanInMinutes
Parameter.designDesc: Monitoring item timespan in minutes (more than 1 interval in one item)

MethodExecute.name: ValidateEqualSplitOfIntervalsInTimeSpan
MethodExecute.designDesc: Validate that monitoring timespan divides equally to interval

TargetDefinition.name: EndingTimeOfCurrentItems
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Starting time of new monitoring item(s)

TargetDefinition.name: NewResourceUsageBlobs
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Resource usage collections after last monitoring item

TargetDefinition.name: StartingTimeOfNewItems
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Ending time of complete monitoring item(s). Ensuring that resource records go beyond this time interval.

TargetDefinition.name: EndingTimeOfNewItems
TargetDefinition.designDesc: Ending time of complete monitoring item(s). Ensuring that resource records go beyond this time interval.

TargetDefinition.name: NewMonitoringItems
TargetDefinition.designDesc: New monitoring items. Empty and to be populated.

MethodExecute.name: PopulateMonitoringItems
MethodExecute.designDesc: Populate monitoring items. Inclusive start time, exclusive end time.
